sections.heading: or referendum petition; sponsor's affidavit; falsely swearing; penalty
sections.text: Any person who knowingly and falsely swears to a sponsor's affidavit on a petition filed under section 32-1407 shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor.SourceLaws 2024, LB287, ยง 64.

32-1552.Initiative or referendum petition; sponsor's affidavit; falsely swearing; penalty.

Any person who knowingly and falsely swears to a sponsor's affidavit on a petition filed under section 32-1407 shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 2024, LB287, ยง 64.
